header.subintro: X-Bot will take over inefficient repetitive activities so that you can take the time to focus on things that add true values for your customer.

message.sended: Hello, Anna here. While checking order 591628 I found an error in the delivery address. I want it delivered to our company address, not the invoicing address.
message.received: Sorry, but I don't understand. Rephrase the question or try looking in the FAQ.

message.sended: Hello, Anna here. While checking order 591628 I found an error in the delivery address. I want it delivered to our company address, not the invoicing address.
message.received: Hello Anna. We understand. We've sent a link to confirm your delivery address change to the email address listed in order 591628. Can we help you with anything else?

items.comment: “Thanks to the X-bot, our customer support gets significantly fewer conversations, even though the number of interactions with website visitors has increased. Thanks to the virtual agent, we are closer to our customers and offer them better service. With the experience of competing solutions, we were pleasantly surprised by the professional solution of the virtual agent and the entire Xolution team. The big advantage is that X-Bot is constantly learning and thus responds to our customers and the development of our company.“

IteliBot project delivered a great tool and service to our customers, which has moved user comfort again a bit forward. At the same time, we found a perfect partner we love to cooperate with. Based on that experience, we have been extending our cooperation by very interesting and useful projects. I cannot wait for the next new projects and I am really glad this project didn’t stop with the implementation itself, but it continues with further improvements, which are appreciated by us and our customers.

person.name: František Poupě
person.company: Technical Support & Services Manager - ComAp a.s.

items.comment: My cooperation with Xolution began with a chance meeting, and I have to say that I really didn’t expect that it would lead to such a pleasant relationship between our companies. Over a relatively short time-span we succeeded in accomplishing quite a bit, and I have to say that not only is the entire Xolution team innovative and professional, but they also have a very good attitude to the customer and are very willing to address their requirements. I am looking forward to our future collaboration.

person.name: Tomáš Matušovič
person.company: Product manager and support for digital products, Viessmann s.r.o

items.comment: We have started our cooperation with Xolution just recently, however since beginning it had been clear that we were tuned to the same wave length. We are amazed by enthusiasm, effort, performance and professionalism of all members of their team. The cooperation on our X-Bot project moves performance and engagement of whole our team to higher level.

aboutXolution.caption: Před tím, než se nám ozvěte, měli byste vědět:
aboutXolution.title: POZOR, jsme kybernetičtí rebelové

items.title: Proč kybernetici tvrdí, že jsme se určitě zbláznili?
paragraphs: Už 4 roky stavíme v brutální kvalitě virtuální agenty neprobádanou architekturou kybernetiky. Nikdo jiný to takto nedělá.
Jasně, každý říká, že má unikátní technologii. Jak je to s Xolution doopravdy?
Realita je taková, že jsme kybernetičtí rebelové a úmyslně nepoužíváme buzzwords AI a machine learning. Za nás prostě hovoří výsledky.

items.title: Proč světoví AI-masterminds překvapeně zvednou obočí, když jim ukážeme naše řešení?
paragraphs: Vzali jsme dva současné, oddělené proudy kybernetické jazykovědy a spojili je v jednom funkčním modelu.
Udělali jsme to zatím jako jediní. O tomto řešení se totiž ve světě umělé inteligence mluví jako o neproveditelném, jako o bláznovství.

items.title: Proč se (zatím) soustředíme na češtinu a slovenštinu?
paragraphs: To zní jako dost nízké ambice, malý trh, …. .
Tyto dva jazyky nám nyní úplně stačí pro vývoj něčeho grandiózního.
Jsme kousek od toho dokončit to a jako první na světě vytvořit globálního chatbota, který se neustále sám zlepšuje v jakémkoliv jazyce. Musíme ho ale nejdřív  vyladit v jazyce nám blízkému.
To nám umožní obratem, automaticky škálovat do každého jazyka na světě.

items.title: Jak je možné, že virtuální agenty u konkurence  stojí statisíce dolarů a X-Bot je za zlomek ceny?
paragraphs: Zatímco ostatní jsou buď drazí, protože produkt je komplikovaný, nebo levní, ale nepoužitelní. Díky elegantnímu twistu v architektuře produktu se nám podařilo zvýšit kvalitu porozumění a to za současného snížení nákladů na implementaci. Takže si dnes i běžný zaměstnanec supportu dokáže natrénovat bota v kvalitě, kterou si dosud mohly dovolit jen korporáty.
Každý klient totiž naučí našeho core virtuálniho agenta něco nového a ten tuto zkušenost automaticky používá u toho dalšího.
Tak je postaven od prvního dne, sám sebe automaticky vylepšuje.

items.title: Jak je možné, že virtuální agenty u konkurence  stojí statisíce dolarů a X-Bot je za zlomek ceny?
paragraphs: Zatímco ostatní jsou buď drazí, protože produkt je komplikovaný, nebo levní, ale nepoužitelní.
Díky elegantnímu twistu v architektuře produktu se nám podařilo zvýšit kvalitu porozumění a to za současného snížení nákladů na implementaci.
Takže si dnes i běžný zaměstnanec supportu dokáže natrénovat bota v kvalitě, kterou si dosud mohly dovolit jen korporáty.
Navíc kvalita porozumění nepřetržitě roste. Každý klient totiž naučí našeho core virtuálniho agenta něco nového a ten tuto zkušenost automaticky používá u toho dalšího.
Tak je postaven od prvního dne, sám sebe automaticky vylepšuje.

meta.description: Zákaznická podpora musí denně zodpovědět tuny dotazů na správnou velikost produktu, technické parametry, stav objednávky, reklamaci nebo termín dodání. Představte si ale, čemu by se mohli operátoři věnovat, pokud by 60–96 % těchto dotazů zodpověděl někdo za ně.

tab1.headline: The potential of artificial intelligence for companies
tab1.text: The set of opportunities that has become available to companies around the world with the arrival of artificial intelligence is huge.

tab2.headline: What are current trends telling us about robotization?
tab2.text: Is it still relevant to talk about robotization and the onset of artificial intelligence as being in the distant future? Automation offers many benefits.

tab3.headline: At Xolution Academy, we are preparing students of IT for the onset of new RPA technologies.
tab3.text: In cooperation with the Slovak IT Association, Xolution is sending its experts to Slovak high schools specializing in information technology that teach RPA (robotic process automation). We want to prepare the young generation...

tab4.text: In short, X-Bot is one of the proofs that the time and money investment in a smart conversation bot pays off...

about.title: WE'RE EXPERTS IN CONVERSATIONAL  ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
about.caption: We're here to deliver solutions that will help organizations grow. Our aim is to explore new options and bring value to our clients’ day-to-day lives. We're monitoring future trends and looking for innovative ways to do things differently.

footer.caption: a platform connecting students, scientists, entrepreneurs, teachers, investors, and anyone else who is interested in artificial intelligence.

xbot.title: Meet X-BOT – the first Czecho-Slovak chatbot with artificial intelligence. This smart and very quick to learn virtual assistant offers huge potential for managing your company and communicating with your customers.

customer.title: What specific benefits does X-BOT offer your customers?
customer.description: Využite skutočne revolučný spôsob starostlivosti o vašich zákazníkov vrátane transformácie zákazníckej skúsenosti a konverzačného marketingu.

sections.title: 24/7 customer care
sections.description: X-BOT is the ideal employee – it never sleeps and is always in a good mood. Customers can contact it whenever they want.

sections.title: Customized offers
sections.description: X-BOT remembers a customer’s every activity, and perceives their mood and preferences. During communication, it collects extremely valuable marketing data on customers, which can then be used to personalize offers.

sections.title: Multi-channel communication and intelligent search
sections.description: X-BOT lets customers communicate when and how they want. Customers can thus arbitrarily switch between their favourite communication channels: Facebook, Skype, SMS, or Web Chat. X-BOT will immediately give them a precise answer to their question directly in the chat window.

sections.title: A human touch
sections.description: X-BOT can speak with your customers in a quite natural way, and can thus get closer to them.

company.title: What specific benefits does X-BOT offer your company?
company.description: Vyberte si pre vašu spoločnosť pohotové automatické riešenia vďaka spoľahlivému a plne digitalizovanému riadeniu firemných procesov.

sections.title: Fully automated processes
sections.description: X-BOT simply answers thousands of queries instead of you, and performs thousands of tasks in real time.

sections.title: Cost savings
sections.description: X-BOT is capable of taking over 65 % of repeat activities, thus taking a significant load off your employees, who can do more complicated work.

sections.title: Unlimited performance
sections.description: X-BOT will take care of thousands of clients in a fraction of a second, and processes thousands of transactions with incredible speed.

sections.title: Automatic learning
sections.description: X-BOT is constantly learning – it uses neural networks, automatically increasing its knowledge base.

abilities.title: What is X-BOT capable of?
list: Creates a customer profile based on their preferences
Offers the customer services available in their vicinity
Searches for and reserves a free date/time
Connects customers with a live operator

implementation_progress.title: What will X-Bot’s road to your company be like?

phases.description: Setting a strategy for deploying artificial intelligence
Setting project goals and creating dialogue trees
Identification of the Bot’s personality, UX design
X-Bot is supplied in sprints. The client affects the project process
Full deployment of X-Bot in real-life operation.
Support and modifications according to user feedback and achieved KPI.
